headline: Xero to Buy Melio for Initial $2.5 Billion in U.S. Growth Play
summary: The Australia-listed accounting-software provider Xero will partly fund the largest acquisition in its 19-year history with a $1.2 billion institutional placement.

raw.headline: Xero to Buy Melio for Initial $2.5 Billion in U.S. Growth Play
raw.summary: The Australia-listed accounting-software provider Xero will partly fund the largest acquisition in its 19-year history with a $1.2 billion institutional placement.

headline: Zacks.com featured highlights Intuit and Ferrari

headline: Calamos Phineus Long/Short Fund Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: Calamos Phineus Long/Short Fund rose 0.93% in Q1 (Class I shares at NAV), compared with a price decline of -4.27% for the S&P 500 Index and loss of -2.15% for the MSCI World Index.
